title: Discussion-Based Civic Engagement Competency Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Social Science Concepts and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Practice-centered curriculum for pre-service teachers and social sector job seekers

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can explain at least three citizen engagement promotion techniques applicable in real educational settings.
Learners demonstrate over 70% participation in 4-person discussion groups and can propose collaborative problem-solving strategies.
Over 90% of learners include specific action plans for addressing local community issues in their final project submissions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
